publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3434 Margaret Mitchell: North Lanarkshire Carers Together—That the Parliament commends North Lanarkshire Carers Together for the work it conducts which aims to raise the profile of carers and improve awareness of carers’ issues and concerns; congratulates it for improving the lives of carers in North Lanarkshire and providing a voice for carers in the planning of future services; applauds its outstanding record at influencing change both at a local and national level, and encourages the Scottish Executive to continue funding North Lanarkshire Carers Together through carers development money allocated to North Lanarkshire when its funding is due for review in March 2006.

S2M-3434 North Lanarkshire Carers Together (lodged on 21 October 2005) Robin Harper*, Mr David Davidson*, Alex Johnstone*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Michael McMahon*, Bill Aitken*, Mary Scanlon*
S2M-3434 North Lanarkshire Carers Together (lodged on 21 October 2005) Chris Ballance*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3434 North Lanarkshire Carers Together (lodged on 21 October 2005) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Murdo Fraser*
S2M-3434 North Lanarkshire Carers Together (lodged on 21 October 2005) Alex Neil*
S2M-3434 North Lanarkshire Carers Together (lodged on 21 October 2005) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S2M-3434 North Lanarkshire Carers Together (lodged on 21 October 2005) Elaine Smith*
